sentences.english: To study the effect of pine pollen on the high blood-fat level model experimental animals.

sentences.english: Objective: In this study, the zinc bioavailability of natural and broken Masson pine pollen was determined.

sentences.english: The research aimed to compare the effects of different breaking wall methods on the sporoderm-broken rate of Ceratopteris thalictroides spores.

sentences.english: ConclusionThe walls of the cells were broken.

sentences.english: How is Chezhongwu Jinlong, to be broken in the years to fly.

sentences.english: The standard curve method was determined to assay the broken-red-cell rate.
